definition: to dye/to catch (a disease)/to acquire (bad habits etc)/to contaminate/to add color washes to a painting

sentences.english: Part 4 Liao River Basin Water Pollution Prevention recommendations to improve the legal system.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是辽河流域水污染防治。

sentences.english: You can get the norwalk virus from hand to mouth activity or from contaminated food.
sentences.chinese: 你可以得到手诺瓦克病毒污染的食物或活动口。

sentences.english: The utility model can effectively avoid foreign odor and harmful gas emitted by the contamination of the drain.
sentences.chinese: 能有效避免排污管被污染而散发异味和有害气体。

sentences.english: Sufficient space should be given to avoid mix-ups and cross-contamination.
sentences.chinese: 留有足够的空间以防止混批和交叉污染。

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是关于空气污染与静脉血栓关系的数据却很有限。
夜晚的污染程度则会下降。

sentences.english: Industrial machinery or to prevent oil pollution on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 工业上可防止机械或地面上的油污染。

sentences.english: These substances leak from the rusty barrels and pollute soil.
sentences.chinese: 这些物质从生锈的桶中渗出然后污染了土壤。

sentences.english: Please use placemat, avoid environment pollution.
sentences.chinese: 使用时请用垫布等，避免污染环境。

sentences.english: This complex emits low pollution levels and employs many workers.
sentences.chinese: 联合企业释放低污染并且雇用很多工人。

sentences.english: If all the IZs in the province were filled up, environment pollution would be a great deal more serious.
sentences.chinese: 如果省内的工业区全部投产，环境污染将更加严重。

sentences.english: Production costs and pollution can be reduced in iron-smelting by means of SAD in small blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 小高炉使用硫酸渣炼铁能降低生产成本，减少污染。

sentences.english: Many biological and non-biological factors have polluted indoor air.
sentences.chinese: 室内空气常被许多生物和非生物因素污染。

sentences.english: The plan to phase down environmental pollution is progressing successfully.
sentences.chinese: 逐步减少环境污染的计划正在顺利进行。

sentences.english: The citizens are disgusted with the factory because of the pollution that the factory has caused.
sentences.chinese: 由于这家工厂制造成污染，居民们对它极为讨厌。

sentences.english: The paper can provide some academic bases for buffer technology to deal with non-point pollution.
sentences.chinese: 并为缓冲带技术处理面源污染，提供一定的理论依据。
